summary: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.
cast: Emma Roberts|Craig Gellis|Rich Cooper|Max Thieriot|Amy Bruckner|Kay Panabaker|Cliff Bemis|Tate Donovan|David Doty|Laura Harring|Pat Carroll|Monica Parker|Caroline Aaron|Marshall Bell|Daniella Monet|Kelly Vitz|Josh Flitter|Phil Abrams|Robert Merrill|Joanne Baron|Ryan Raddatz|Adam Goldberg|Emmy Laybourne|Elyssa Davalos|Rosemary Morgan|Amanda Alva|Ahna O'Reilly|Ashley-Nicole Sherman|Shaina Vorspan|Krystle Hernandez|Rachael Leigh Cook|Kaitlyn Van Item|Barry Bostwick|Lucille Soong|Dana Lee|Edgar Borjas|Darnell Dickens|Adam Hendershott|Adam Clark|Vito D'Ambrosio|Thom Williams|Jared Weber|James Wing Woo|Eddie Jemison|Chris Kattan|Alex Richard|Lindsay Sloane|Bruce Willis
title: Nancy Drew
